Name: Estilo Viejo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Basically, a Tequila Old-fashioned, it's even better when made with añejo tequila.
History: The name of this drink literally translates from Spanish as 'Old Style'.
Nutrition: One serving of Estilo Viejo contains 195 calories
